scripts.test: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
scripts.dev: dev() { for i in "$@"; do $npm_package_config_env npm run dev -w "$i"; done; }; dev
scripts.dev:app: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,cyan' 'npm run dev -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run dev -w graphql-server' 'npm run dev -w ui'
scripts.dev:graphql-backend: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'npm run dev -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run dev -w graphql-server'
scripts.build: build() { for i in "$@"; do $npm_package_config_env npm run build -w "$i"; done; }; build
scripts.build:all: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server,repo-job,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,cyan,green' 'npm run build -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run build -w graphql-server' 'npm run build -w ui' 'npm run build -w repo-job'
scripts.build:app: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,cyan' 'npm run build -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run build -w graphql-server' 'npm run build -w ui'
scripts.build:graphql-backend: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'npm run build -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run build -w graphql-server'
scripts.serve: serve() { for i in "$@"; do $npm_package_config_env npm run serve -w "$i"; done; }; serve
scripts.serve:app: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server,ui -c 'yellow,magenta,cyan' 'sleep 2 && npm run serve -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run serve -w graphql-server' 'npm run serve -w ui'
scripts.serve:graphql-backend: $npm_package_config_env concurrently -n gateway,server -c 'yellow,magenta' 'sleep 2 && npm run serve -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run serve -w graphql-server'
scripts.lint: concurrently -n gateway,server,ui,repo-job -c 'yellow,magenta,cyan,green' 'npm run lint -w graphql-gateway' 'npm run lint -w graphql-server' 'npm run lint -w ui' 'npm run lint -w repo-job'
scripts.compose:up: up() { $npm_package_config_env docker compose -f config/compose/docker-compose.$1.yml --env-file .env.$1 up $2; }; up
scripts.compose:down: down() { $npm_package_config_env docker compose -f config/compose/docker-compose.$1.yml --env-file .env.$1 down $2; }; down
scripts.compose:build: build() { $npm_package_config_env docker compose -f config/compose/docker-compose.$1.yml --env-file .env.$1 build $2; }; build
